summary:
I am an ambitious, results-oriented professional with a broad experience in different Financial business partner roles. I belief in learning-by-doing, and live by the adagio "work hard, play hard". 

Success for me is about taking chances when they appear, but also creating your own chances by embracing change and deploying a constant will to keep learning. 

I consider the combination of my analytical skills and a pragmatic can-do mentality, together with my ability to connect with stakeholders on different levels, as my most valuable asset in being a successful business partner. 

I want to further develop towards a Strategic Finance Business Partner-role, connecting and translating business ambitions into financial goals, and in charge of executing the strategic finance agenda.

school.name: Maastricht University School of Business and Economics

profile_positions.description:
DSM is a purpose-led performance driven organization, focused on Health, Nutrition and Bioscience, 
with the ambition to contribute and make a meaningful impact to the challenges in the global food systems (People, Planet, Livelyhoods).

In role as Project controller contributing to the development and financial performance of the Shared-services domain within DSM and the Support Functions.														
											
Strategic Business Cases;													
- Supporting and challenging senior business management in translating business objectives into financial business cases for managerial decision making.														
															
Program Control;														
- Setting up governance structures in strategic programs for financial and managerial reporting.
- Securing uniform accounting treatment within context of IFRS and DSM Accounting Rules.
- Building and improving standards for reporting and tooling.
														
Capital Investments;														
- Trigger and facilitate managerial decision making on large capital investment programs.
- Develop formats, tooling and standards for business cases and managerial reporting. 
- Securing uniform accounting treatment within context of IFRS and DSM Accounting Rules.
profile_positions.title: Project & Investment Controller

profile_positions.description:
Vrumona is an independent, 100% subsidiary of Heineken Netherlands, located in Bunnik and operating as a softdrinks company on the FMCG-market. 

In role of Supply Chain controller being part of the Supply Management Team, and acting as primary business partner from Finance. 														
															
Planning & Control cycle;														
- Prepare, challenge, organize and adjust annual plans and departmental budgets during the year.
- Draft, challenge and process relevant departmental KPI's and targets. 											
- Analyse monthly results and budget-variances.										
- Discuss monthly results within MT and with relevant stakeholders.													
															
Capital Investments;														
- Coordinate, facilitate and challenge long-term investment programs and calculate financial implications.
- Challenge status and progress in executing agreed annual Capex-plan.											
- Support and challenge project leaders on business cases for large investment projects (> 0.2M €).											
- Coordinate alignment with stakeholders and perform final edit on decision-making documents for large investment projects in order to facilitate good and flexible decision-making.
- Execute post-audits on large investments projects (>1.0M€).														
															
Pricing, Tooling & Instrumentation;														
- Develop relevant tooling and reports to facilitate and challenge decision-making and business performance.
- Calculate transfer prices and filling fees for Contract Filling.
- Prepare cost models and business cases for sourcing questions and contract filling.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Controller

profile_positions.description:
Working as a decentralized business controller for three sales regions covering the southern part of the Netherlands - all focused on selling beer in the Out-of-Home market. 

Working in role as Sales Controller, together with Sales on the intersection of commercial aggressiveness and solid financial judgement in a highly competitive market.
															
Planning & Control cycle;														
- Act as linking-pin between Head-office and decentralized sales operation to assure and facilitate the implementation of developed policies in daily routines and ways of working.
- Prepare monthly results in P&L, analyze budget variances and discuss mitigating actions with Sales- and account managers.														
															
Customer Profitability;														
- Support, advise and challenge Sales on the effectiveness of commercial spend via cost-analysis and the development of relevant tooling.
- Develop tooling and instrumentation for Sales to facilitate decision making and excellent sales execution. 														
															
Loans & Funding;														
- Assess, advise and communicate on funding opportunities for customers in the out-of-home market.
profile_positions.title: Sales Controller

profile_positions.description:
Statistics Netherlands (CBS) is the national statistical office, enabling people and society to have debates on social issues on the basis of independent and reliable statistical information.

Various staff roles in P&O and later Finance, after finishing a two-year Traineeship.															
														
Assistant Project Controller (Jan 2010 - Feb 2011); 														
- Assist Senior Business Controller in monitoring and reporting on the performance of an innovation portfolio focused on corporate process innovations.
 													
Organizational Consultant (Sep 2005 - Dec 2009); 
- Advise management on the alignment and translation of organizational goals into effective organizational structures, processes and job roles.

Auditor (Sep 2007 - Dec 2009); 
- Participate in audit projects on statistical processes and organizational units - both as Auditor and as Teamlead.														
															
Staff Member HRM (Jan 2003 - Aug 2005);														
- Participate in the corporate development and introduction of HRM policy and instrumentation 														
															
Traineeship (Dec 2000 - Dec 2002); 														
- Various projects (Statistics, Methodology, Quality, HRM) during a period of two years combined with personal coaching, training and education.
profile_positions.title: Statistics Netherlands (CBS)
